name: AAROGYAA FOUNDATION FOR HEALTH PROMOTION AND COMMUNITY BASED REHABILITATION
briefDescription: "Aarogyaa Foundation For Health Promotion and Community Based Rehabilitation “ An Organization dedicated for the person with disabilities working for the all sections of the disabilities like locomotor,cerebral palsy,autism,multiple disabilities,deaf and dumb,mentally retarted and visually impaired childrens.” We are working for rehabilitation and social justice for disabled children ,who require assistance in the society to get and use their human rights provided by our government schemes through guidance of our experts so that everyone in the society will get an equal opportunities without any discrimination. Our experts of research field working hard to make assistive and adaptive devices as much as cost effective or free through different schemes to make disabled as much functional independent as possible to improve his ADL. We provide assistance in the free distribution camps through our government policies and make these devices available for the sufferer with perfection.
